name: DDimerTest
title: D Dimer Test
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel code(s) for D-Dimer Test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum, or plasma for D-Dimer Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: D-Dimer test, using the source of blood, serum, or plasma, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent D-Dimer Test as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
